fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Select a player and a card type. Apply 1 phase of Cursed on them.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Select a player and a card type. Apply 3 phases of Cursed on them. 

*Stackable (per player). Status takes effect **this** phase. It is publicly announced when someone gets Cursed. If there are multiple Curses __by different players__ on a target, they will all be active in the same phase. Otherwise, Curses by the same player will stack and activate one per phase. Read <#1191650444594909354> for more information on player statuses.*
